answers.answer: You need to follow up on all this with your provider. Symptoms on this many body parts and as you've described are not part of genital herpes and need further evaluation.grace

yeh I'm wondering if it's diabetes...I read up on the sypmtoms...and I have EVERY LAST ONE. I read too that viral infections can cause diabetes. Just great. Anyway I'm going to nephrologist this week --- a specialised doctor for kidneys, diabetes, liver all those internal organs, And I'm gonna get to tho bottom of this. I just need to know, you know?

question: Hi Im new, and I recently got diagnosed with herpes (about 2 months ago). In those past two months, I have experienced some weird things with my body. My entire left side seems to getting pricked with pins and needles some times. I have neck pain, shoulder pain, and it feels like I have a weight around my ankle sometimes when I walk. Lately, my nipples (Im a female) have been getting a tingling/sharp pain momentarily. I can not sleep at night, and sometimes when I wake up, I have a SPLITTING headache -- like my brain has been up all night.Im gettign to the point where Ive coem to terms that I have herpes, but I am wondering if I have a NEW disease now?! My soul can only take so much....I am 21 and NO ONE knows whats goin on in my life. I am so afraid. Can any body help?
title: Herpes and Left Side Tingling
